00017 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUnitConv.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include "proj.h"
00021 #include "gctp_prototypes.h"
00022 #include <stddef.h>
00023 
00036 MTKt_status MtkSomXYToLatLon(
00037   int path,       
00038   double som_x,   
00039   double som_y,   
00040   double *lat_dd, 
00041   double *lon_dd   )
00042 {
00043   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00044   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00045   MTKt_MisrProjParam pp;    /* Projection parameters */
00046   int iflg;         /* GCTP status flag */
00047   double lat_r;         /* Latitude in radians */
00048   double lon_r;         /* Longitude in radians */
00049   int (*inv_trans[MAXPROJ+1])(double, double, double*, double*); /* Array of function ptrs (Not used) */
00050 
00051   if (lat_dd == NULL || lon_dd == NULL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00053 
00054   status = MtkPathToProjParam(path, 0, &pp);
00055   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00056 
00057   inv_init(pp.projcode, pp.zonecode, pp.projparam, pp.spherecode,
00058        NULL, NULL, &iflg, inv_trans);
00059   if (iflg)
00060     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_GCTP_INVERSE_INIT_FAILED);
00061 
00062   iflg = sominv(som_x, som_y, &lon_r, &lat_r);
00063   if (iflg)
00064     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_GCTP_INVERSE_PROJ_FAILED);
00065 
00066   status = MtkRadToDd(lat_r, lat_dd);
00067   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00068 
00069   status = MtkRadToDd(lon_r, lon_dd);
00070   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00071 
00072   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00073 
00074 ERROR_HANDLE:
00075   return status_code;
00076 }
